name: Kha'Zix
title: the Voidreaver
q_displayname: Taste Their Fear / Evolved Reaper Claws
r_dispalyname: Void Assault / Evolved Adaptive Cloaking / Void Assault 2

i1.blurb: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.
description: {{sbc|Isolation:}} '''Kha'Zix''' marks all nearby enemies who aren't accompanied by any of their allies nearby as ''Isolated''. '''Kha'Zix's''' abilities have special interactions against ''Isolated'' targets.

{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kha'Zix''' gains ''Unseen Threat'' when the enemy team loses {{tip|sight}} of him, causing his next [[basic attack]] against an enemy [[champion]] to deal {{pp|14 to 150|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} and {{tip|slow}} them by 25% for 2 seconds.
i1.name: Unseen Threat
notes: * ''Unseen Threat's'' damage will cause {{iis|Muramana}} {{nie|Shock}} damage to trigger twice with a single basic attack.
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} do not interact with ''Unseen Threat's'' bonus damage.

q1.blurb: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on Isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Reaper Claws, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against Isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kha'Zix''' slashes the target enemy, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}}, increased by 100% against ''Isolated'' targets.

{{sbc|Evolved Reaper Claws:}} '''Kha'Zix''' gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} on his basic attacks and ''Taste Their Fear''. If the target is ''Isolated'', 45% of ''Taste Their Fear's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is refunded.
leveling: {{st|Physical damage|{{ap|50 to 150}} {{as|(+ 130% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Isolation Physical Damage|{{ap|50*2 to 150*2}} {{as|(+ 260% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.name: Taste Their Fear

w1.blurb: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for extra.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kha'Zix''' fires a cluster of spikes in a line that detonates upon hitting an enemy dealing them {{as|physical damage}}.
'''Kha'Zix''' {{tip|heals}} himself if he is within detonation radius.

{{sbc|Evolved Spike Racks:}} ''Void Spike'' fires three clusters in a cone, {{tip|slow|slows}} by 60% and grants {{tip|sight}} of enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Multiple explosions do not deal extra damage to the same target or provide '''Kha'Zix''' with additional healing.
''Isolated'' targets hit by ''Evolved Void Spike'' are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 90% instead.
w1.name: Void Spike
notes: * ''Void Spike'' is actually be composed of two mini projectiles which proceed in the target direction in a helical pattern, meaning it's collision radius is somewhat random.

e1.blurb: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kha'Zix''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} to the target location, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies upon landing.
{{sbc|Evolved Wings:}} ''Leap'' gains increased range and its {{sti|cooldown}} is reset on enemy champion {{tip|takedown|takedowns}}.
e1.name: Leap
notes: * ''Kha'Zix'' can still use summoner spells and activate items while mid-air.
* ''Leap's'' speed depends on distance (melee-range jumps are near instantaneous while long-ranged ones keep ''Kha'Zix'' in the air for significantly longer).
* ''Kha'Zix'' is still targetable while jumping and is considered to be on the ground for the purposes of skillshots ({{ai|Enchanted Crystal Arrow|Ashe}}, {{ai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}}).
* Crowd control effects will take effect upon ''Kha'Zix'' landing.

** Displacements ({{ai|Headbutt|Alistar}}, {{ai|Pulverize|Alistar}}, {{ai|Rocket Grab|Blitzcrank}}, {{ai|Howling Gale|Janna}}, {{ai|Monsoon|Janna}}, {{ai|Fling|Singed}}, {{ai|Death Sentence|Thresh}}, {{ai|Rolling Thunder|Volibear}}) will cancel ''Leap'' and then take effect.

r1.blurb: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes Invisible, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking, while out of combat Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault upon entering a new brush.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Each rank in ''Void Assault'' allows '''Kha'Zix''' to evolve one of his abilities, granting it additional effects.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kha'Zix''' enters {{tip|invisibility}} for {{ap|1.25}} seconds, acquiring {{ai|Unseen Threat|Kha'Zix}}, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, and {{tip|ghosted|ghosting}} while stealthed.
After 2 seconds of leaving {{tip|invisibility|stealth}}, and for the next 10 seconds, ''Void Assault'' can be cast a second time at no additional cost.
{{sbc|Evolved Adaptive Cloaking:}} Increases the {{tip|invisibility}} duration to 2 seconds, and can be cast up to 3 times.
r1.name: Void Assault
notes: * ''Void Assault'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Kha'Zix's'' previous orders.
* Every time ''Void Assault'' is ranked a secondary menu will pop up for ''Kha'Zix'' to choose which ability to evolve (can only be done once for each).
** Selecting one will cause ''Kha'Zix'' to begin channeling, receiving the evolution when it ends (disabling or killing ''Kha'Zix'' while transforming will not stop him from gaining the evolution).
*** The only way for ''Kha'Zix'' to evolve all of his abilities is to gain the fourth evolution point by being victorious in [[The Hunt is On!]] (by scoring a kill/assist on {{ci|Rengar}}).
